critique: The executive order is a formal document that aims to reorganize governmental functions. It does not obviously try to evoke any strong emotions. The order seems to convey a sense of resolution and order, but not strongly. Therefore, I will score joy, sadness, anger, fear, disgust, and surprise all as 1 initially. After further consideration, I think the order is not trying to evoke any emotions, so I will revise all scores to 1.
